'''Bernard Cribbins''' (born [[December 29]] [[1928]] in [[Oldham]], [[Lancashire]]) is an [[England|English]] [[character actor]] and musical [[comedian]].
'''Bernard Cribbins''' (born [[December 29]] [[1928]] in [[Oldham]], [[Lancashire]]) is an [[England|English]] [[character actor]] and musical [[comedian]].
  +
==Career==
==Career==
Born in Oldham, he served an [[apprentice|apprenticeship]] at the [[Oldham Repertory Theatre]], taking a break during his years of study to undertake [[National Service]] with the [[Parachute Regiment (United Kingdom)|Parachute Regiment]] in his late teens.<ref name="GavBark">{{citeweb|url=http://www.gavinbarkerassociates.co.uk/actors/bernard-cribbins.htm|title=Bernard Cribbins|publisher=Gavin Barker Associates|accessdate=2008-04-05}}</ref>
Born in Oldham, he served an [[apprentice|apprenticeship]] at the [[Oldham Repertory Theatre]], taking a break during his years of study to undertake [[National Service]] with the [[Parachute Regiment (United Kingdom)|Parachute Regiment]] in his late teens.<ref name="GavBark">{{citeweb|url=http://www.gavinbarkerassociates.co.uk/actors/bernard-cribbins.htm|title=Bernard Cribbins|publisher=Gavin Barker Associates|accessdate=2008-04-05}}</ref>
